content: **knitted jacket in drops melody the piece is worked bottom up with stocking stitch v-neck ¾-length sleeves and i-cord sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ml-109 yarn group d or a + a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 250-250-300-300-350-400 g colour 21 light blue **buttons** drops buttons no 612 3-4-4-4-4-4 items needles drops circular needles size 6 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needles size 4 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge ** 14 stitches in width and 16 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
